details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.7 Unicode character maps - Unicode mapping
details.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-1, 7.21.7.

rule.description: The Font dictionary of all fonts shall define the map of all used character codes to Unicode values, either via a ToUnicode entry, or other mechanisms as defined in ISO 14289-1, 7.21.7.

error.message: The glyph can not be mapped to Unicode
